naslov: Villa Maximiliana - Jedinstvena antistres oaza u Zagrebu (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Do you want to visit Zagreb & enjoy a lovely family & pet friendly villa? Then visit Villa Maximiliana! Unique antistress green oasis, a secluded family friendly villa in a peaceful neighbourhood, located on the hill with a scenery view and a huge garden with 1900 m2 garden area, fully fenced & pet friendly along with the mixed fruit ochyard. Free parking for 5 cars. 15 minute drive to city center (main square) and 2 minute drive to Zagreb cable car. The house consists of 230 m2 and 1,990 m2 garden (completely fenced), 5 bedrooms + a gallery with a bed in the attic, 3 bathrooms + 1 toilet, the open space consists of a kitchen, a dining room and a living room with a fireplace. In the organic and ecological orchard, there are hazelnut and walnut trees, quinces, apricots, several varieties of cherries, several varieties of apples, several varieties of sour cherries, several varieties of plums, pears, elderberries, chokeberries, and wild strawberries. You can freely pick all the fruits. Central heating with gas condensing boiler, fireplace, heating/cooling with air conditioners, underfloor heating on the ground floor. The kitchen is fully equipped. Internet - optical, speed 1 gbps Jedinstvena antistres oaza u Zagrebu. Kuća u prirodi s velikom terasom i okućnicom podno Medvednice. U mirnom dijelu ulice, pozicionirana na brijegu, zagarantira privatnost. U organskom i ekološkom voćnjaku se nalaze stabla lješnjaka i oraha, dunja, marelica, više sorti trešnje, više sorti jabuka, više sorti višnje, više sorti šljiva, kruška, bazga, aronija, divlje jagode. Sve plodove možete slobodno ubirati. Kućni ljubimci dozvoljeni. Kuća se sastoji od 230 m2 i 1.990 m2 okućnice (potpuno ograđene), 5 spavaćih soba + galerija sa ležajem u potkrovlju, 3 kupaonice + 1 wc, otvoreni prostor čini kuhinja, blagavaona i dnevni boravak s kaminom. Centralno grijanje plinskim kondenzacijskim bojlerom, kamin, grijanje/hlađenje klima uređajima, podno grijanje u prizemlju. Kuhinja potpuno opremljena. Internet - optički, brzina 1 gbps Za više fotografija pogledajte sljedeći link: Kuća je udaljena svega 15 minuta vožnje automobilom od trga bana J. Jelačića, 15 min od Črnomerca, 15 min od okretišta tramvaja Dubrava i svega nekoliko minuta od Žičare Sljeme. Google maps link/poveznica: https://maps.app.goo.gl/MopMghiRRMDP6W7Q9
Troškovi: Agencijska provizija: Najmoprimac ne plaća agencijsku proviziju
